DOC.brief_summary: In study intend randomly assign parturient one two commonly use oil applied second stage labor , one contain vitamin E. We verify perineal massage increase chance deliver intact perineum compare two oil . As secondary objective , evaluate effect perineal massage specific tear location , severity perineal tear amount suture material require repair .
DOC.brief_title: Searching Perfect Oil Protect Perineum : A Randomized-Controlled , Double-Blind Trial
DOC.criteria: Singleton pregnancy Term pregnancy Nonvertex pregnancies Multiple pregnancy Placenta previa Placental abruption Intrauterine infection Non progressive labor first stage Former operation surgical procedure vagina Perineal massage week labor
